title.value: Formulation of biological product for etioprophylaxis of pasteurellosis and salmonellosis in furproducing animals
Разработка биопрепарата для специфической профилактики пастереллеза и сальмонеллеза пушных зверей

journal.title: Animal Agriculture and Veterinary Medicine : quaterly research and practice journal

person.name: Andrusevich, A.S., National Academy of Sciences. Scientific and Practical Center of Animal Breding (Belarus). The S.N. Vyshelesskij Inst. of Experimental Veterinary Medicine
Kurdeko, A.P., Belarus State Academy of Agriculture, Gorki (Belarus)

abstract.value: Vaccine against pasteurellosis and salmonellosis in fur-producing animal has been formulated. It is sterile, innocu-ous, areactogenic and immunogenic biological product. Its application on fur-farms of the Republic of Belarus helps to decrease the incidence of diseases and increase productivity of fur producing animals
